game.name: YouTuber Management Game
game.description: Manage a YouTube channel by creating content, engaging with your audience, and growing your subscriber base.

resources.name: Revenue
resources.description: Total revenue earned from the channel.

options.name: Upload New Video
options.description: Upload a new video to your channel.

options.name: Live Stream
options.description: Host a live stream for your audience.

options.name: Reply to Comments
options.description: Reply to comments on your videos.

options.name: Social Media Promotion
options.description: Promote your channel on social media.

options.name: Upgrade Equipment
options.description: Invest in better equipment for higher quality videos.

options.name: Take a Course
options.description: Take an online course to improve your content creation skills.

options.name: Collaborate with Other YouTubers
options.description: Collaborate with other YouTubers to grow your audience.

options.name: Advertise Channel
options.description: Invest in advertising to attract new subscribers.

events.name: Viral Video
events.description: One of your videos goes viral.

events.name: Negative Feedback
events.description: A video receives a lot of negative feedback.

events.name: Platform Update
events.description: YouTube introduces a new feature that benefits your channel.
